posts.postText: Is there anyway to make it so you can view the shop while dead, maybe not buy or equip anythin but give you something to pass the time, also ive been killed while in the shop before, comments, insults, and bronies are accepted
I heard that it messes stuff up. Like points gone, items ka-sploding. So probably not.
This is something we should get because i dont like waiting 10 min for the round to end just to buy hp upgrade or low grav because then ill have to wait another round for it to be activated.

I do enjoy the shop, but there is a legitimate reason it is closed while your dead.
 (Items are purchased, points are removed from your balance, but you never REALLY get the items) 
But I would also agree with a *view only* dead shop, or even a different layout shop, we should AT LEAST get a /points command to see our current point value.
